channel.title: Axoloti used by STUFF., a Belgian jazz band
channel.description: I was pleased to see a band called STUFF. perform at Pukkelpop, a festival in Belgium a week ago. One of the guys was wearing an Axoloti tshirt (see pic). I think they used an Axoloti as a sound source for an electric clarinet. Now I realised they actually have a song that's definitely inspired by Axoloti: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DMQPdiQHWrQ I think we should be proud to have such great musicians part of the community. :grinning:

item.title: Axoloti used by STUFF., a Belgian jazz band
item.dc:creator: @Joren
item.description:
@Joren wrote:

The electronic clarinet player is quite active with the Axoloti. He even gave a workshop on it somewhere. Lander Gyselinck, the drummer of the band also has been experimenting with Axoloti. I'm not sure if the drummer uses it on stage.

Read full topic
item.source: Axoloti used by STUFF., a Belgian jazz band
